title: High Queue Wait Time (Oldest Queued Age)
description: This monitor tracks the average time jobs spend waiting in the n8n queue before being processed. High wait times indicate processing bottlenecks that may impact workflow SLAs.

definition.name: [n8n] High Queue Wait Time (Oldest Queued Age)
